# canSetSessionPreset(_:)

**Instance Method**

Determines whether you can configure a capture session with the specified preset.

## Declaration

```swift
func canSetSessionPreset(_ preset: AVCaptureSession.Preset) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **preset**: A preset value to test.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the capture session supports the preset; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

Use this method to determine whether the capture session, in its current I/O configuration, supports a particular preset. You can only set a preset that returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] as the capture session’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/sessionPreset] property value.

## Setting a session preset

- **AVCaptureSession.Preset**: Presets that define standard configurations for a capture session.
- **sessionPreset**: A preset value that indicates the quality level or bit rate of the output.
